description.narrative: To expand the Danish Youth Delegate Programme with two delegates on the thematic area of technical and vocational education and training (TVET) and job creation with the purpose of 1) engaging a group of young stakeholders traditionally not engaged in the Danish development cooperation and 2) ensure that this group of youth is represented in relevant multilateral fora as well as the ministry’s work on TVET and job creation. https://duf.dk/internationalt-arbejde/dufs-internationale-pulje

To expand the Danish Youth Delegate Programme with two delegates on the thematic area of technical and vocational education and training (TVET) and job creation with the purpose of 1) engaging a group of young stakeholders traditionally not engaged in the Danish development cooperation and 2) ensure that this group of youth is represented in relevant multilateral fora as well as the ministry’s work on TVET and job creation.
